values.desc: Return a string for the EGL error code, or the hex representation if the error is unknown.
return the internal format as defined by OpenGL ES of the supplied bitmap.
Return the type as defined by OpenGL ES of the supplied bitmap, if there is one.

values.code: texImage2D(target: Int, level: Int, internalformat: Int, bitmap: Bitmap!, border: Int)
values.desc: Calls glTexImage2D() on the current OpenGL context.

values.code: texImage2D(target: Int, level: Int, internalformat: Int, bitmap: Bitmap!, type: Int, border: Int)
values.desc: A version of texImage2D() that takes an explicit type parameter as defined by the OpenGL ES specification.

values.code: texImage2D(target: Int, level: Int, bitmap: Bitmap!, border: Int)
values.desc: A version of texImage2D that determines the internalFormat and type automatically.

values.code: texSubImage2D(target: Int, level: Int, xoffset: Int, yoffset: Int, bitmap: Bitmap!)
values.desc: Calls glTexSubImage2D() on the current OpenGL context.

values.code: texSubImage2D(target: Int, level: Int, xoffset: Int, yoffset: Int, bitmap: Bitmap!, format: Int, type: Int)
values.desc: A version of texSubImage2D() that takes an explicit type parameter as defined by the OpenGL ES specification.
